p: Compound 181 (50 mg·kg −1·day −1) was orally administered to CD-1 mice with parasite clearance of 44.6 ± 5.6%. Although this is the first in vivo efficacy reported, a follow-up dose-response study (25–100 mg·kg −1·day −1) showed poor parasite clearance at other concentrations, and no clear dose-response was observed.
